summary: This is a court calendar for the Southern District of New York for the week of July 22, 2019, listing scheduled civil and criminal proceedings. It includes numerous unrelated cases and shows the routine court operations during the week Jeffrey Epstein was arrested (July 6, 2019), but no Epstein-related proceedings are listed on this specific calendar.

persons.name: Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge listed for multiple proceedings throughout the week, including attorney admissions and naturalization ceremonies.

persons.name: Gardephe
persons.context: Presiding judge for a jury selection in the case 'Callaghan v. URR'.

persons.name: Engelmayer
persons.context: Presiding judge for multiple proceedings, including sentencings and pretrial conferences in various criminal cases.

persons.name: Crotty
persons.context: Presiding judge for status conferences and sentencings in civil and criminal cases.

persons.name: Rakoff
persons.context: Presiding judge for sentencings, pretrial conferences, and oral arguments in various criminal and civil cases.

persons.name: Pauley
persons.context: Presiding judge for a send trial and sentencings in civil and criminal cases.

persons.name: Oetken
persons.context: Presiding judge for numerous initial pretrial conferences (IPTC), pretrial conferences (PTC), and sentencings.

persons.name: Castel
persons.context: Presiding judge for bench trials, sentencings, and status conferences.

persons.name: Carter
persons.context: Presiding judge for a bench trial and a sentencing.

persons.name: Nathan
persons.context: Presiding judge for numerous initial conferences, IPTCs, and sentencings, primarily on July 26, 2019.

events.title: Weekly Court Proceedings Begin
events.description: Start of the week's scheduled civil and criminal proceedings in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Naturalization Ceremony
events.description: A naturalization ceremony scheduled in the jury assembly room.

locations: Daniel Patrick Moynihan courthouse, 500 Pearl Street
keyFacts: This document is a routine court calendar for the Southern District of New York for the week of July 22, 2019.
No proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, or associated individuals are listed on this calendar.
The calendar shows the high volume and variety of cases (sentencings, trials, conferences) handled by the court during a typical week.
The document lists three main courthouse locations in New York: the Daniel Patrick Moynihan, Thurgood Marshall, and White Plains courthouses.
